name: Mech 4X (unfinished)
description:
Controls:  Click and drag to move the camera, scrollwheel to zoom in and out.      Select units with the left mouse button and move them with right click.  Press R to reload and generate a new map.

You can build cities and units and explore the map. Cities can be improved with production and food bonuses. Build specific buildings to unlock more advanced units. Unfortunately I didn't have time to implement the combat like I wanted to, so there is no working combat.

 Currently the Encounter squares (the big red cubes) will create a small encounter map with randomly generated enemies but combat is not actually playable.
